property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Off-Road Patrols has +1 ATK. When an enemy combines or an enemy Arises -> Draw 2 cards. When one of your characters battles an enemy in Legend mode and you have an Off-Road Patrol on your battlefield -> Your battling character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Captain Impactor, Special Ops Wrecker is a Wrecker. Your starting Star limit increases by 1 if you began the game with at least 2 Wreckers on your starting team. While one of your Wreckers is battling an enemy that has 10 Stars or more and you have Captain Impactor, Special Ops Wrecker on the battlefield -> It has Bold 1 and Pierce 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Ramjet, Sky Smasher is a Seeker. If your starting team is only Seekers -> Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card -> Instead do 1 damage to this and the upgraded character takes no damage. Then, if this has at least 2 damage, scrap it. When this is scrapped from a character -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Planes, Helicopters, or Seekers. When the upgraded character does attack damage to an enemy that has fewer Stars than it -> Do 1 damage to each enemy that has fewer Stars than the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 damage from one of your characters to an enemy. You may do 1 damage to one of your Aerialbots -> If you do, do 2 damage to an enemy Decepticon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wihle this card is in your hand -> If your opponent's card would cause you to scrap this card, instead reveal this card and it isn't scrapped. One of your characters gets +2 ATK and Bold 2 until end of turn. Then, flip one of your characters from Bot or Body mode to Alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this on a character only if you had a Mercenary on your starting team. Focus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can be in an Armor slot. When you put this on a character -> Return an enemy Armor or Utility to its owner's hand. If you can't, repair 1 damage from the upgraded character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at each face-down enemy Secret Action. You may do 1 damage to one of your Wreckers -> If you do, do 2 damage to each enemy with the highest number of Stars on your opponent's team.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 ATK until end of turn. If a character on your team is in Legend mode -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 ATK until end of turn. If a character on your team is in Legend mode -> Do 2 damage to an enemy not in Legend or Bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When your opponent plays an Action or Upgrade from their hand. When Revealed -> One of your characters gets Stealth until end of turn. If one of your characters is in Legend mode, each of your characters gets +1 DEF until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one or more of your face-down Secret Actions is scrapped -> Do damage to an enemy equal to the number of cards scrapped this way. When you flip to this mode -> Scrap each face-down Secret Action you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +2 ATK for each face-down or face-up Secret Action you have. At the end of your opponent's turn, if you began the game with only Deceptions on your starting team -> Choose up to 2 face-down Secret Actions you have, and they aren't scrapped this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with the highest number of Stars on your team has Brave while untapped. When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a [W] card, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each your characters gets Bold 1 until end of turn. Then, you may flip one of your other Heralds from Alt mode to Bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, you began the game with no Stratagems, and you had no Autobots on your starting team -> Put a Matrix of Leadership you own from outside the game in his Utility slot, ignoring all restrictions. Then, Arise.

property.name: Text
property.value: This is a Megatron character and has 2 Utility slots. When one of your Decepticons battles and you flip battle icons of at least 3 different colors -> Flip 1 extra battle card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1, Pierce 1. If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, you began the game with no Stratagems, and you had no Leaders on your starting team -> Arise.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. Bold 2, Tough 2, Pierce 2. Enemies lose Sturdy and can't become Sturdy.

card.name: Mercenary Bumblebee - Hero in the Making

property.name: Text
property.value: If you began the game with Optimus Prime on your starting team -> This has Stealth while untapped. When you flip to this mode -> You may play a Utility from your hand. If you don't, draw a card.

alternate.name: Mercenary Bumblebee - Hero in the Making

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1. When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Flip this to Alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, and you had no Decepticons on your starting team -> Draw 2 cards. Then, Arise.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1, Focus 1. When this battles and you flip at least one Autobot card -> He gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this would be KO'd by an opponent's card, you began the game with no Stratagems, and you had an Autobot Leader on your starting team -> Arise.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth against characters with 14 Stars or more. When you flip to this mode -> Choose an enemy and move 1 damage from one of your Heralds to it. If that enemy is a character with 14 Stars or more, move 2 damage instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2. The first time one of your characters attacks each turn and you flip at least [W][W] -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit increases by 1 if you have a Ranged Seeker on your starting team. This has Stealth while untapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a card with no battle icons -> This gets +1 ATK until end of turn. When one of your Seekers attacks with an Upgrade with no battle icons -> It gets +1 ATK and Pierce 1 until end of turn.
